name: The Painter
description:
Jump from painting to painting to unravel the dark story of a family. Remove the smudges to relive the memories and uncover the painting's true state. 
   Nominated in Swedish Game Awards -19 for Best Narrative( Winner yet to be announced ).

This is a story driven game with simple controls, so sit back in your chair and enjoy. But don't forget to play with sound! :)

The game has support for both controller and mouse & keyboard. 

Made in 7 weeks as a student game project at Futuregames. 

Brought to you by Team 7:

Game Design: Chloë Dunn-Asselin, Daniel Nyberg, Jesper Bentzer
Programming: Antonia Kiili, Alexander Wedman, Victor Jespersen
2D Art: Embla Fröberg, Beatrice Karlsson
3D Art: Kevin Fransson, Attila Herczeg, Mikael Karlsson
Sound & Music Design: Antonia Kiili

A working mac build is on its way!
